data.name: Unfolded : Camellia Tales - Prologue
data.detailed_description:
WISHLIST THE FULL GAME

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1357990/Unfolded__Camellia_Tales/


About the Game

Old school Point-and-Click Journey based on history

Set on Jeju Island in the late 1940s, Unfolded : Camellia Tales covers a story of a massacre on a peaceful island and Herman and his friends' struggle to survive.

Meet the islanders. Talk to your family, friends, villagers, and survivors hiding in the cave. Find out how to help them.
Use your wits. Combine items and use them to your advantage.
Write your journal. Pass your memories and thoughts to future generations.
Experience Herman's coming-of-age story dotted with tragedy, humor, and poetry.

Features

  • A coming-of-age story set in 1948, Jeju Island, South Korea
  • Sometimes dark, sometimes deep, but mostly lighthearted dialogues and characters.
  • Fully hand-drawn 2D graphics and animations
  • Different Chapters with different sets of background
  • Unique puzzles inspired by the history and folklore of Jeju Island
  • Satisfying difficulty for adventure gamers

data.short_description: The first chapter of a hand-drawn 2D point-and-click adventure, Unfolded : Camellia Tales. Follow the journey of Herman, a boy who lived through the most tragic times in the history of Jeju Island, Korea. Explore the beautiful wilderness and experience the coming-of-age story.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
